properties.name: wica.test-logging-on-startup
properties.description: Can be used to enable a test of logger performance when the application is started.

properties.name: wica.epics-ca-library-monitor-notifier-impl
properties.description: The configuration for PSI's CA library when using it to establish channel access monitors.

properties.name: wica.epics-ca-library-debug-level
properties.description: The configuration for PSI's CA library when logging.

properties.name: wica.channel-resource-release-interval-in-secs
properties.description: Period after which the resources associated with a Wica Channel will be released if they are no longer in use.

properties.name: wica.channel-publish-monitor-restarts
properties.description: Whether a channel disconnect value will be published if the monitoring associated with a channel is restarted.

properties.name: wica.channel-monitored-value-buffer-size
properties.description: The number of values that can be held in the control system monitored value buffer before older values start getting thrown away.

properties.name: wica.channel-polled-value-buffer-size
properties.description: The number of values that can be held in the control system polled value buffer before older values start getting thrown away.

properties.name: wica.channel-get-timeout-interval-in-ms
properties.description: The default timeout in milliseconds to be applied when getting the current value of a wica channel.

properties.name: wica.channel-get-numeric-scale
properties.description: The default number of digits after the decimal point when getting the current value of a wica channel.

properties.name: wica.channel-get-value-default-fields-of-interest
properties.description: Semicolon separated list specifying the default names of the fields that will be returned when getting the current value of a wica channel.

properties.name: wica.channel-get-metadata-default-fields-of-interest
properties.description: Semicolon separated list specifying the default names of the fields that will be returned when getting the metadata associated with a wica channel.

properties.name: wica.channel-put-timeout-interval-in-ms
properties.description: The default timeout in milliseconds to be applied when putting a new value to a wica channel.

properties.name: wica.stream-metadata-fields-of-interest
properties.description: The fields of interest that should be serialized when sending the channel metadata.

properties.name: wica.stream-quote-numeric-strings
properties.description: Whether strict JSON compliance should be used when serializing NaN and Infinity values (=true) or whether JSON5 serialization compliance is acceptable (=false).

properties.name: wica.cors-allow-credentials
properties.description: Which origins must be present in the http request header in order for a request to be accepted.

properties.name: wica.cors-allowed-origins
properties.description: Which origins must be present in the http request header in order for a request to be accepted.
